body.name: J JOYACCESS Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo with 7 Backlit Options,Quiet Light Up Keys,Type-C Rechargeable,Sleep Mode-2.4G Slient Portable Cordless Combo for Laptop/PC/Computer/Mac(White+Sliver)
deliveryMessages: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
features: 【Backlit Keyboard and Mouse Wireless】Wireless keyboard and mouse set come with 7 switchable backlight options, providing different visual typing experiences.The light up keys make typing at night becomes a breeze. Additionally, the illuminated keyboard and mouse offer three brightness levels (low, mid, high, or off), allowing you to freely adjust the keyboard's brightness or even turn off the LED lights.

【Type-C Rechargeable and Smart Energy Saving】Both the keyboard and mouse can be easily charged using Type-C cable (included), you don't need to buy batteries separately. With a full charge, the wireless rechargeable keyboard can standby for up to 365 days, while the wireless mouse can standby for 270 days (Without Backlight). The built-in smart power-saving feature puts the keyboard to sleep after 60 seconds of inactivity and the wireless mouse after 90 seconds. Press any key to wake them up.

【Quiet and Comfortable Typing】The silent keyboard features scissor-switch low-profile keys, providing a responsive and smooth typing experience((2mm stroke length). You can work at home without worrying about disturbing others. The computer keyboard also has a tilt angle for maximum comfort during long typing sessions, providing wrist support and reducing strain. The ergonomic mouse is designed to conform to the natural contour of your hand, reducing pressure on the wrists and hand muscle.

【5 Adjustable DPI Mouse and Backlight Design】Wireless Mouse DPI 2400 in 5 levels - You can easily change the cursor sensitivity of this wireless mouse according to your activities: usually 1600 DPI for office use, DPI 2000-2400 for 4K resolution monitors or for recreational activities such as gaming at home. With 7 color backlit options and silent clicks, the cordless mouse is stylish and aesthetically pleasing, creating a relaxing atmosphere and avoiding disturbing your colleagues and family.

【Ultra-Slim and Compact Design】This wireless keyboard and mouse combo is both stylish and ergonomic, featuring a streamlined design. Full-size keyboard including numeric keypad, slim and compact, making it easy to store in a laptop bag or suitcase.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 2,284 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 7 Colors Backlit Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo Wireless keyboard with 7 backlight colors and 3 levels of brightness, silent mouse have 800/1200/1600/2000/2400 dpi and 7 backlit modes, can be adjusted at any time the keyboard and mouse light effect or can be turned on or off backlit at any time.

Stable Connection，Fast Response Simply connect both keyboard and mouse with the same USB receiver. It's easy to install, plug and play, and you will not experience any connection or lag issues! Powerful and reliable connection range is up to 10 meters（33ft）. Compact Keyboard with Numeric Keypad and LED indicator You can easily catch the status of the Numberic Lock indicator, Caps Lock indicator and Power indicator at any time. Don’t miss any beats at work. You will enjoy the smoothest and most accurate typing experience and will work more efficiently. Comfortable, Quiet typing The low profile keys allows less noisy compared to conventional keyboard, and the buttons of the coreless mouse are silent,which let you concentrat on work and avoid disturbing other surrounding,great for home and office!

Black Full Size keyboard and mouse Grey Full Size keyboard and mouse Connection 2.4GHz Wireless 2.4GHz Wireless Quiet Click ✓ ✓ Layout Size Full Size Full Size Compatibility Win,Mac,Chrome Win,Mac,Chrome

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard and mouse worked as expected. I like the color changing lights, it sometimes snaps me out of daydreaming while I should be typing. lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Backlit and Awesome!
reviews.reviewText: Keyboard and mouse light up. Keeps a charge for a long period of time, using continually for 8-9 hours a day. No batteries required. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid KB & Mouse for price
reviews.reviewText: Pros-easy plug and play, plugged the USB receiver to the computer and KB and mouse started working immediately.-light weight, aesthetically nice looking KB and Mouse comboThings to note:Key board - this is a semi-compact KB. It is not a full-size KB, but it does have num pad, and delete/home/end buttons. Appearance is nice. Illumination is good, you can adjust the colors and brightness (of KB only, mouse has a rotating RGB setting).Mouse - very light weight and easy to use, however it is a standard 3 button mouse, I previously had a 6 button (back and forward keys) and really miss those keys at times.Cons- No FN lock key, you have to 2-hand FN functions. This is a bit of a frustration for the end user and major oversight by the manufacturer.- KB is not angle adjustable, it comes at a slight angle which is fine, but being able to adjust the angle makes for better ergonomics and again a major oversight on this product.- would have like "backspace" key to be a little bigger (double key).- like most products in this price range, materials are cheap lightweight plastic.Overall - although there are some associated cons with this product I am happy with the product and will continue to use it. However, I recognize that these CONS are not insignificant and can be a deal breaker for some, it almost was for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keyboard works as expected, which is good.
reviews.reviewText: Keyboard and mouse interfaced exactly as expected. Both work and operate just fine. My only issue is the key buttons, but it just takes a little getting used to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive Keyboard ever bought before
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard is truly outstanding, with a comprehensive range of features. The backlight's brightness is sufficient for providing ample illumination during evening work or gaming sessions, and the keys are silent, ensuring they won't disturb nearby family members. The seven switchable backlight colors allow for personalized adjustments based on individual preferences, and you can also easily turn off the backlight to save power.Here are some notable experiences with this keyboard:1.The seven backlight colors can be freely switched to match different gaming or studio themes, creating a great atmosphere.2.It's a durable and robust keyboard, making it suitable for wireless setups in gaming rooms—I'd recommend it to others.3.The keyboard has a stunning appearance, exuding a high level of fashion; it's an excellent choice if aesthetics matter to you.4.Both the keyboard and mouse support charging functionality, eliminating the need for frequent battery purchases or replacements. Additionally, they automatically enter sleep mode after a few minutes of inactivity to conserve power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like how slim and responsive the keys are. Not clunky or difficult to press on. Very good for school or work where fast and accurate typing is a must, and the mouse is an added bonus. The charging cord is long, and I can leave the keyboard plugged in while in use. All in all, very good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This product should NOT be called a "Wireless Set"
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased wireless keyboard sets many times during my career as a Field Engineering professional. However, when I opened up this keyboard set and saw CABLES, I was shocked.I spent the next 45 minutes to an hour trying to understand, that if both items required CHARGING before they could be used, why was there only 1 cable?The so-called instructions that came in the box was useless. I plan to find a way to return this item to amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's a bit smaller than my other keyboard, but quiet & easy typing
reviews.reviewText: It's a bit smaller than my previous keyboard, but ease of typing and quiet keys are a plus

Excelente teclado y mouse, a un super precio, y lo mejor de todo tiene pila recargable, no ocupas pilas alcalinas.Es super compacto, y tienen pad numerico, lo uso siempre para llevar con mi lap y en el trabajo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best keyboard+mouse combo in given price from JOYACCESS :-)
reviews.reviewText: It's completely value for money. Excellent Product & everyone should go for it. Keyboard is quite light weight & mouse is super easy to use. No complaints so far. With this wireless combo, I feel leaner in my day to day life. Another good thing is that I also used it for my smart tv & it works very well. Build quality is awesome. Lightweight & sturdy at the same time. Also, best thing is that it has all keys including numeric keypad along with its compact size. Packing was such a strong that I got my product without any breakage or damage. Thanks Joyaccess team for manufacturing such a great product. Became your fan forever.

Great long lasting battery life, didnt charge it when I got it and after 21 days of being used (often for 18 to 20 hours a day) the mouse finally needed recharging, and I am still waiting for the keyboard to go flat! I love the universal design of the mouse, as a left hander I am finding more and more mice are solely designed for right handed people, so a simple mouse with no weird shape or side buttons is excellent for me. The only minor issue I have, and it really is minor, is where the delete, home, page up, page down and end keys are, I have never had a keyboard with them anywhere other than above the numeric keypad so I am still finding myself accidently hitting them instead of the backspace, enter and shift keys, but I think it is more of a me issue, it is definitely shown like that in the picture and it wouldn't have stopped me from buying it if I had noticed. Great set and an affordable price.

Nice, simple, and neat package and quick delivery. I got it the next day after I ordered. I bought it for office working use. I chose a set with a plain black keyboard and a mouse. The Keyboard is smaller than I imagine. The key cap is matte, and there is almost no sound when you hit the keys, which is better for me so I will not bother my colleagues. By the way, the keys on this keyboard are arranged compactly because of its relatively small size. It takes a little time to get familiar with it but I think I will get used to that eventually. Inputting is smooth just like the normal wired keyboard and mouse. Nothing to complain about. Also, the keyboard is more convenient to charge with a USB cable than with a removable battery. Overall, it is a good deal for this price. I will recommend you this product if you are a similar budget.
Excelente la relación calidad-precio, buen producto, bonito, fácil de usar y cómodo. Venía con un cubre teclados de regalo. No es nada estorboso.
